Module.Content: <link rel="stylesheet" href="css/CSReview.css"/> <link rel="import" href="CSReview.html"/> <div id="root"/> <script src="scripts/jquery-3.3.1.js"></script> <script src="scripts/common.js"></script> <script src="scripts/CSReview.js"></script> <script> // takes main-html and attaches it to the root div here // doing it this way for syntax highlighting in the other files $(document).ready(() => $('#root').load('CSReview.html')); </script>
